original_text: Crowds of people came together to hear Philip speak. They saw him do many miracles which showed that God was with him. So they listened carefully to his message.
korean_text: 무리가 빌립의 말도 듣고 행하는 표적도 보고 한마음으로 그가 하는 말을 따르더라

sentences.original_text: They saw him do many miracles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 많은 기적을 행하는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: which showed that God was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 그와 함께 계심을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: So they listened carefully to his message
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그의 메시지를 주의 깊게 들었다
